description: Fix issue when serializing pipeline definitions containing list elements (`issue 705 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/issues/705>`__)
Fix issue when recursively removing keys containing control characters (`issue 675 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/issues/675>`__)
Honor ``--no-verify-ssl`` in high level ``aws s3`` commands (`issue 696 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/issues/696>`__)
